item.title: Book Review - A Psalm for the Wild-Built
item.description: A Psalm for the Wild-Built Becky Chambers, 2021, a Science Fiction/Solarpunk Novella The story is set in a post-AI utopia, where the robots, upon gaining consciousness, fled into the wild, and humanity rebuilt its society with a reverence to nature, including technology.
